meanings: (때·시기 등에 이르다) be, come, become; (나이가) reach, (formal) attain; (경과하다) pass
(동사적 명사에 붙어) become, get to be, be
a remark that does not work at all
a remark that does not work at all

vlive.korean: 변함이 없는 것은 30이 되어도 위로와 함께 하고 있겠죠? The thing that doesn't change is that I will be with WELO when I am 30, too, right? 듣기 View video ONG SEONG WU : 헬로옹
vlive.english: The thing that doesn't change is that I will be with WELO when I am 30, too, right?

vlive.korean: 제가 대머리가 되어도 좋아하실 건가요? Are you guys okay with me being bald? 듣기 View video NCT : goodnight & good morning💚NEO CITY💚
vlive.english: Are you guys okay with me being bald?

vlive.english: It doesn't matter who the person is...

examples.korean: In some sports you’re past it by the age of 25. 발음듣기 일부 스포츠에서는 25세만 되어도 한물간 나이가 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In some sports you’re past it by the age of 25. 발음

examples.korean: In those days most people left school when they were only fifteen years old. 발음듣기 그 당시에는 대부분의 사람들이 (나이가) 15세만 되어도 학교를 떠났다[마쳤다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In those days most people left school when they were only fifteen years old. 발음

examples.korean: If there are two pilots-you and a Singaporean-and only one of you has a chance for promotion. Would you be okay if the Singaporean gets promoted? 발음듣기 만일 조종사가 당신과 싱가폴인 두 명인데, 한 명만 승진이 된다면 싱가폴인이 되어도 괜찮겠습니까? DARAKWON
examples.english: If there are two pilots-you and a Singaporean-and only one of you has a chance for promotion. Would you be okay if the Singaporean gets promoted? 발음

examples.korean: be fair game for ridicule 발음듣기 놀림감이 되어도 싼 사람. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: be fair game for ridicule 발음

examples.korean: I'll be beggared if I get you. 발음듣기 만약 내가 너를 얻는다면 거지가 되어도 좋다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I'll be beggared if I get you. 발음
